DOC.brief_summary: Use olopatadine ophthalmic solution ( eye drop ) decrease allergy skin test reactivity .
DOC.brief_title: Olopatadine Eye Drops Allergy Skin Testing
DOC.criteria: Adults age 18 75 year Healthy volunteer ( major illness active symptom ) Known allergy hypersensitivity drug component Pregnant nursing woman Women wish become pregnant study 's duration Use topical oral medication antihistaminic activity 14 day proceed randomization Dermatographism evidence skin test visit 1 Chronic urticaria active within past 6 month Severe hypertension Psychiatric diagnosis could potentially affect medication compliance , schizophrenia delusional disorder , determine investigator obtain inform consent base subject 's past medical history Inability provide inform consent
